name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hacker News - Saved You a Click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a link to open both the article link and comments page, saving a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On Hacker News pages it adds a link to open both the article link and comments page, saving a click. Tabs open by default in the background but this can be toggled.

Open source and free to use. Code available on the website (link on the right)
